xml:
Evorel<tm tmtype="reg"/> Sequi Indications and dose

Menopausal symptoms in women with a uterus

Osteoporosis prophylaxis in women with a uterus

By transdermal application

  • Adult

    Apply 1 patch twice weekly for 2 weeks, Evorel 50 patch to be applied and started within 5 days of onset of menstruation (or at any time if cycles have ceased or are infrequent), followed by apply 1 patch twice weekly, Evorel Conti patch to be applied, subsequent courses are repeated without interval.

 Patient and carer advice

Patients and carers should be advised on the application of Evorel Sequi patches.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
